type: Tutorial Step - What’s in a Profile?

definition.text: So what are we waiting for? Let’s get started! To participate in Governance you will first need a User Profile.

paragraphs.text: Your profile is set up just like the rest of the Superalgos system. It is a hierarchy of nodes. Only this hierarchy defines how you intend to use the Token Power you have earned or is delegated to you by other users.
By channelling your token power you help decide what parts of the system will be incentivised for further development and who will be rewarded for the community roles they have played.
